title: Ticket #7256: SSL doesn't propagate errors well unless high debug levels are on
description:
If SSL authentication fails, for example because an issuer CA cert is missing that is needed to validate a certificate, you sometimes don't see anything useful in the log unless you have D_SECURITY and/or D_FULLDEBUG turned on, which is extremely verbose.

Fatal errors should be logged at D_ALWAYS. All the other details can stay at high debug levels.
